Name: Linked Mask
About the game: About this game: On the ruins of a great wasteland, 6 Towers were built. Towers are home to each deity - and to those who worship them. Deities are known as interpreters. They are public figures that project themselves through music and dancing. Their personalities are what define how the inhabitants of this land live and act. Each fate, each voice, each dream is tied to the towers, their deities - and the masks. Obtain them all and free the world by navigating through a set of increasingly-difficult twists and turns in Linked Mask - a captivating call-back to the golden days of the Game Boy era. Features include: MODERN CLASSIC - Linked Maskâ€™s artstyle is designed as a throwback to handheld games of the early 90's, mixed with a uniquely modern presentation CHALLENGE THE 6 TOWERS - Each tower consists of multiple levels of increasing difficulty, and ends with a battle with a Deity. Collect 6 Masks of the Deities, and face the ultimate challenge - The Castle of the Primals. GROW STRONGER WITH EVERY VICTORY - Gather 6 Masks - each granting a special weapon and a traversal ability. Then return to the Towers with new abilities in hand - and discover new areas and bonuses. GREAT BEATS TO PLATFORM TO - Chillingly cool soundtrack will make your head bop as you traverse the deadly Towers - and each fight with a Deity will be accompanied by epic music.
